summary.span: 做為所有區域控制項的基底類別，而這些控制項則做為 (或其他伺服器或使用者) 控制項的容器。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for (or other server or user) controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是複合控制項，轉譯為 HTML 表格，包含定義網頁的區域中的其他控制項。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page. 類別是繼承自基底區域類別，並提供一組基本的行為衍生區域包含控制項、 伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。The class is a zone that inherits from the base class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls, server controls, and user controls. 組合區域與（和其他伺服器） 控制項表單的 Web 組件的應用程式，標準使用者與大部分的情況下進行互動的頁面檢視的主要 UI。The combination of zones with (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time. 所有區域包含的控制項都提供一組常用的 UI 項目。All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain. UI 項目通用於所有區域的詳細討論，請參閱類別概觀主題適用於類別。For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 區域包含包含伺服器控制項相關聯的本文區段物件用來呈現所包含的控制項和其 chrome，其動詞命令、 和等元素的框線，等等。The zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on. 除了繼承自功能類別類別會加入用戶端控制項拖曳、 特定的動詞命令 （以啟用一般 UI 動作例如降至最低，關閉、 刪除和編輯控制項），以及其他樣式功能。In addition to the features inherited from the class, the class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features. 類別也是如果您想要設計的自訂區域資料庫導向繼承的類別。The class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven. 比方說，您可以建立繼承自天氣自訂 Web 組件區域，而且設計來包含和提供的版面配置功能和其他服務的是資料繫結並顯示天氣資訊的控制項。For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from , and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for controls that are data-bound and display weather information. 類別包含數個區域中的樣式屬性的屬性。The class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone. 有幾個屬性的框線，包括和。There are several properties for borders, including and . 沒有內容功能表才會出現在標頭的區域，例如的樣式屬性所使用的一群， ，和其他人。There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as , , and others. 類別也包含用於處理區域中的動詞命令的成員數目。The class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone. 這些成員與相關聯的動詞命令，會出現在組件中的控制項區域。These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone. 雖然區域層級動詞命令可以加入至區域，依預設並沒有任何。While zone-level verbs can be added to zones, by default they do not have any. 沒有一組設定以用於組件控制項之 Web 組件控制項所提供的標準動詞命令，而且開發人員可以加入自訂的動詞命令。There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well. 動詞命令所使用的一些重要屬性包括屬性會參考某些一個標準動詞的物件，例如， ， ，和， ，和。Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as , , , and , , and . 在區域中包含的每個控制項的標題列中 （通常是在 UI 中以下拉功能表呈現） 動詞命令功能表顯示的標準動詞命令。The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone. 另外還有屬性，可讓您判斷哪些類型的可點按物件代表在 UI 中的動詞命令。There is also a property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI. 動詞命令所使用的其他索引鍵成員包含方法但不會覆寫自訂動詞命令建立程序處理的事件處理常式，而事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. 類別使用包含的成員數目區域內所包含的控制項。The class contains a number of members for working with controls contained within a zone. 屬性參考的所有集合（和其他伺服器） 的區域中的控制項。The property references the collection of all (and other server) controls in the zone. 數個方法會對應至使用者可以在上執行的標準動詞命令或動作控制項在區域中，例如， ，和。Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on controls in a zone, such as , , and . 另外還有中的成員數目類別該顧慮如何配置或在區域中排列控制項。There are also a number of members in the class that concern how the controls are laid out or arranged within the zone. 屬性決定控制項是否可以在區域之間移動或重新排列區域內的使用者。The property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users. 屬性可讓您決定是否水平或垂直排列的控制項區域中。The property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically. > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能會呈現的高度或其包含的控制項，以非預期的方式，在區域的方向而定。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件或屬性。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 中的其他方法類別提供您詳細以程式設計方式控制區域的各個區域的轉譯。Other methods in the class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone. 這些方法覆寫繼承自基底方法類別，以自訂的區域，其中包含轉譯控制項。Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain controls. 重要的方法包括， ， ，和。Important methods include , , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 程式碼會示範如何在衍生類別，用於以宣告方式在 Web 組件頁面中包含控制項。The code shows how a derived class, , is used declaratively in a Web Parts page to contain controls. 程式碼範例有四個區段： 前三個區段描述程式碼檔案和第四個說明如何執行的程式碼。The code example has four sections: the first three sections describe the code files, and the fourth explains how to run the code. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch the page into different display modes. 如需有關 Web 組件的顯示模式及說明此控制項中的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on Web Parts display modes and a description of the code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是程式碼除外的檔案，其中包含處理事件的主要網頁的程式碼。The second part of the code example is a code-beside file that contains the code to handle events for the main Web page. 這個檔案中的程式碼示範如何使用一些索引鍵的成員以程式設計的方式。The code in this file shows how to work with some of the key members programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#4)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是包含網頁控制項的行為的基底類別，和區域中所包含的控制項。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls that exhibit behavior from the base class, and controls contained in the zones. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 使用**顯示模式**將頁面切換到設計模式，請按一下下拉式清單控制項控制項，並再試一次可見區域之間拖曳的方式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into design mode, click the controls, and try dragging them between the visible zones. 按一下以查看使用中的各個成員的效果頁面上的按鈕部分類別。Click some of the buttons on the page to see the effect of using various members of the class. 接下來，將頁面切換至編輯模式。Next, switch the page to edit mode. 請確定控制項放置在`WebPartZone2`，按一下動詞命令功能表控制項的標題列，然後按一下**編輯**，編輯控制項。Make sure a control is positioned in `WebPartZone2`, click the verbs menu on the control's title bar, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 完成編輯該控制項，然後再編輯其他區域中控制項的其中一個。Finish editing that control, and then edit one of the controls in the other zone. 在您執行下列步驟，請注意到控制項和區域 的 UI 樣式中的差異所使用的許多成員的效果類別。As you carry out these steps, notice the differences in the UI styles of the controls and the zones, which are the effect of using the various members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在區域是所在區域中控制項的配置可以變更，例如頁面顯示模式時，才會生效。The property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as . 當設`false`在給定的區域中，有數個使用者無法在區域中控制項上執行的動作：When is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - 使用者無法將控制項拖曳至不同的區域、 重新排列控制項內的區域，或將控制項移至該區域。Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone. - 影響的使用者介面 (UI) 的屬性數目，讓使用者無法編輯這些屬性，使用編輯控制項時，會停用區域中的控制項和控制項...A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the and controls.. - 使用者無法將新的控制項，加入將區域從控制項。Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a control. - 關閉、 刪除、 降到最低，以及還原動詞命令不會顯示區域中控制項上。The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone. 雖然屬性會影響使用者的能力變更透過 UI 區域的版面配置，不會影響以程式設計方式變更版面配置的能力。Although the property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically. 例如，如果設`false`，使用者無法關閉區域中的控制項，但開發人員仍然可以呼叫以程式設計方式控制方法，關閉。For example, if is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the method to close controls programmatically. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性設定為`true`，預設值。Notice that the property is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果您將值變更為`false`，在瀏覽器中載入網頁，並將頁面切換成設計顯示模式之後，您將無法將控制項拖曳內或`WebPartZone2`區域。If you change the value to `false`, after you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you will not be able to drag controls within or into the `WebPartZone2` zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底屬性會覆寫類別來設定區域框線的預設色彩。The base property is overridden by the class to set a default color for zone borders. 您可以設定屬性控制以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。You can set the property for a control either declaratively or programmatically. 只有區域處於時所在的頁面顯示模式會顯示的框線類別使用者介面 (UI) 功能是可見的例如或。The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性設為特定的具名色彩。Notice that the attribute is set to a specific named color. 在瀏覽器中載入網頁，並將頁面切換成設計顯示模式之後，您可以看到屬性的效果。After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底屬性會覆寫類別來設定區域的預設框線寬度。The base property is overridden by the class to set the default border width for zones. 您可以設定屬性控制以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。You can set the property for a control either declaratively or programmatically. 只有區域處於時所在的頁面顯示模式會顯示的框線類別使用者介面 (UI) 功能是可見的例如或。The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性值設定為特定寬度的像素。Notice that the attribute value is set to a specific width in pixels. 在瀏覽器中載入網頁，並將頁面切換成設計顯示模式之後，您可以看到屬性的效果。After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉所參考的動詞命令屬性會出現在每個動詞命令功能表區域中的控制項。The close verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 在關閉控制項移除它互動的網頁上，雖然如果開發人員提供適當的使用者介面 (UI)，例如區域包含控制項，使用者可以將頁面切換成並加入先前的關閉的網頁控制項的執行個體。Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a zone that contains a control, a user can switch the page into and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼屬性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換說明動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the help verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項，其中包含 UI。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the UI. 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定代表關閉動詞命令的動詞命令功能表中的特定文字控制項。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the close verb in the verbs menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 也請注意，因為基礎的自訂控制--名為`TextDisplayWebPart`-用於程式碼範例會設定屬性`false`在其建構函式，``目錄中的項目必須設定屬性`true`，好讓控制項可以關閉下列程式碼範例。Notice also that, because the underlying custom control--named `TextDisplayWebPart`-- used in the code example sets the property to `false` in its constructor, the `` element in the catalog must set the property to `true`, so that the control can be closed in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用核取方塊，啟用和停用關閉的動詞命令，而且您可以按一下**關閉的 WebPart**關閉控制項的動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the close verb, and you can click the **Close WebPart** verb in the verbs menu to close the control. 如果您將網頁傳回給目錄的顯示模式，則會關閉控制項之後，您可以按一下**頁面目錄**，選取的原始執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制您關閉，再重新開啟頁面上。After you close the control, if you return the page to catalog display mode, you can click the **Page Catalog**, select the original instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control that you closed, and reopen it on the page.

span.span: Closes a selected control in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要關閉的終端使用者的一般方式控制項，請按一下控制項的標題列中關閉的動詞命令。The typical way for an end user to close a control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar. 方法呼叫方法類別，會關閉該控制項的動作執行。The method calls the method on the class, which carries out the action of closing the control. 此方法應該只能由衍生這類區域。The method should only be used by derived zones such as . 關閉控制項不會呈現在網頁上。A closed control is not rendered on a page. 不過，它會加入至頁面類別目錄，會維護所有已關閉的控制項在頁面上的清單。Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page. 如果 Web 組件頁面使用者關閉控制項也有``與宣告的項目，使用者就可以將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並將已關閉的控制項加入至網頁。If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `` element declared with a , then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 使用者要能夠關閉控制項，控制項上的屬性和區域上的屬性必須都設為`true`。For a user to be able to close a control, the property on the control and the property on the zone must both be set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法來建立一組區域中所包含的控制項。The method overrides the base method to create the set of controls contained in a zone. 這是當 Web 組件頁面處於設計模式中，因為可以在設計模式中變更控制項在頁面上 （與區域內） 的配置。This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode. 一組區域內的控制項必須同樣地建立要容納可能變更的順序或區域中控制項的次數。The set of controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.

A that contains style attributes for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立一組標準的樣式屬性套用至區域。The method creates a set of standard style attributes that apply to zones. 只有當頁面處於所在區域本身為可見的例如類別目錄、 編輯或設計顯示模式的顯示模式套用這些樣式屬性。The style attributes apply only when a page is in a display mode in which a zone itself is visible, such as catalog, edit, or design display mode.

span.para: 如果您覆寫方法來設定某些特定的屬性上建立的樣式，請勿使用建構函式，這需要您將控制項傳遞版本物件做為參數，導致建立物件共用與區域控制項。這會造成呈現問題。請改用版本的建構函式，所以物件無關的控制項。

If you override the method to set some specific properties on the created style, do not use the version of the constructor, which requires you to pass the control's object in as a parameter, resulting in the created object sharing the with the zone control. This causes rendering problems. Instead, use the version of the constructor, so the object is independent of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁開發人員可以將處理常式加入至這個事件，並附加額外的自訂動詞子區域。Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a child zone. 動詞命令建立區域時，就會引發事件也就是期間階段網頁處理，或在回傳事件。The event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the stage of page processing, or during postback events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的處理常式藉由覆寫事件方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至衍生區域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 程式碼範例包含兩個原始程式檔。The code example contains two source files. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 程式碼範例的第一個部分會是原始碼的簡單控制項衍生自類別。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是針對衍生的原始程式碼區域會覆寫方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至區域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 程式碼也會建立自訂動詞命令顯示的動詞命令功能表中控制項包含在此區域中，並動詞命令建立另一份目前控制項。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載在衍生的區域的網頁和控制項。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`指示詞參考衍生的區域元件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果瀏覽器，將頁面載入控制項會出現在區域中。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 按一下 [動作] 功能表，然後按一下**CopyWebPart**動詞命令，並建立一份控制項。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 讓衍生區域能夠取代自訂的 物件，以變更區域中 控制項的外觀。

span.span: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom object to change the appearance of controls in a zone.

returns.span: ，決定區域中 控制項呈現的方式。

span.span: A that determines how controls in a zone are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個框架周邊的使用者介面 (UI) 項目是指 web 組件 chrome區域中的控制項。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control in a zone. Chrome控制權 」 包括框線、 標題列、 圖示、 標題文字和標題列中出現的動詞命令功能表。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. 色彩的外觀設定區域層級，且適用於所有區域中的控制項。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all controls in a zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 物件會影響整個轉譯控制項，不只是其 chrome 的項目。The object affects the entire rendering of the controls, not merely their chrome elements. 若要使用方法，您必須建立自訂物件來定義區域中的 Web 組件控制項色彩的外觀。To use the method, you must create a custom object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone. 您也必須建立自訂區域繼承自類別並覆寫可以取代您的自訂色彩物件，並將其套用至區域中控制項的方法。You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the class and overrides the method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的刪除指令動詞屬性會出現在動詞命令下拉式功能表中的每個動態標題列區域中的控制項。The delete verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic control in a zone. 無法使用靜態控制項 （控制項的網頁標記中宣告） 上的 delete 動詞命令。The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page). 動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令會顯示只有當頁面處於顯示模式，可讓您變更頁面配置，例如或。The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as or . 永久刪除控制項，從頁面中移除該控制項的執行個體。Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page. 不同於已關閉的控制項，控制項的已刪除執行個體永遠不可以加回頁面。Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page. 當使用者刪除控制項，並接著切換至頁面，如果區域包含控制項，刪除的控制項執行個體不是可用的。When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into , if the zone contains a control, the deleted control instance is not available in it. 如果控制項可在目錄中，但已永久移除已刪除的執行個體，使用者可以將控制項的新執行個體。The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼屬性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換刪除動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the delete verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項，其中包含使用者介面 (UI)。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定表示 delete 動詞命令的指令動詞 下拉式清單功能表中的特定文字控制項。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the delete verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用刪除動詞命令`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，但是動詞命令時，會出現在功能表上只有頁面是在類別目錄或設計顯示模式。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the delete verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, but the verb appears on the menu only while the page is in catalog or design display mode. 如果您按一下**刪除 WebPart**功能表上的動詞命令，永久刪除控制項，並已刪除的執行個體不能加入至網頁。If you click the **Delete WebPart** verb on the menu, the control is permanently deleted, and the deleted instance cannot be added back to the page. 不過，您可以將網頁傳回給目錄的顯示模式，並加入的新執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。However, you can return the page to catalog display mode, and add a new instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的編輯動詞命令屬性控制項可讓使用者切換進入編輯模式，其中使用者可以個人外觀、 屬性、 配置和控制項的內容區域中控制項。The edit verb referenced by the property on a control enables an end user to switch a control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control. 相同的編輯動詞命令用來在區域中的所有控制項。The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone. Web 組件頁面時進入編輯顯示模式 ()，編輯動詞命令會顯示的動詞命令功能表中的每個區域內包含的控制項。When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 請注意在屬性經過存取以宣告方式使用``具有項目`WebPartZone1`控制項。Note that the property is accessed declaratively by using the `` element with the `WebPartZone1` control. 編輯動詞命令會存在於這個控制項上處於編輯模式下，即使您未使用``項目，但使用它，您可以設定它的一些屬性，例如的文字表示的使用者介面 (UI) 中的動詞命令。An edit verb would be present on this control in edit mode even if you did not use the `` element here, but by using it, you can set some of its attributes, such as the text that represents the verb in the user interface (UI). 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫基底屬性，以辨別其中尚未設定此屬性的案例和其中它已設為空字串 ("")。The property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string (""). 如果未設定的屬性，而且區域不包含控制項，Web 組件頁面當進入時的顯示模式所在區域為可見，則預設文化特性特有的文字訊息會出現在空控制項。If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty control. 如果刻意為空字串，設定屬性值，則文字會不顯示任何訊息空白區域中。If the property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會出現在`WebPartZone2`之後您將頁面載入瀏覽器中，, 將頁面切換成設計顯示模式，並拖曳控制項所顯示的日期，從`WebPartZone2`到`WebPartZone1`。This value will appear in `WebPartZone2`, after you load the page into a browser, switch the page into design display mode, and drag the control that displays the date from `WebPartZone2` into `WebPartZone1`. 如需有關如何變更 Web 組件頁面中的顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on changing display modes in a Web Parts page, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取得的初始集合控制區域，只有當此時預先存在的範本或其他形式的決定控制項的區域中的儲存體。The method gets the initial collection of controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone. 此方法並不會反映任何個人化變更，可能表示，初始集合中的控制項實際上已移使用者到另一個區域。The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone. 初始集合的區域中的控制項不一定與集合中包含相同的區域，會轉譯頁面時，取得反映實際的目前集合的區域中控制項的屬性為帳戶所做的任何個人化變更。The initial collection of controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，就可以存取屬性。The property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. 您可以存取以宣告方式在區域中使用``項目來設定文字、 描述、 是否啟用動詞命令，以及其他屬性。You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes. 因為預設會啟用不需要宣告一個區域，不過，說明動詞命令。It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default. 要顯示的動詞命令功能表上的說明動詞命令是必要的唯一步驟區域在執行階段中的控制項是要指派值給個別控制項。The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the property for individual controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 程式碼範例中，除了要使用下列程式碼中，您需要自訂控制項。For the code example to work, in addition to the following code, you need a custom control. 您可以使用自己的控制項，或使用自訂程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中找到的控制項類別概觀。You can either use your own control, or use the code for the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control found in the Example section of the class overview. 這個程式碼範例包含使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。This code example includes a user control to enable you to change display modes on a Web page. 如需顯示模式，此控制項中的原始碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 這個程式碼範例也包含可包含的說明內容的 HTML 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。This code example also includes an HTML page that could contain Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須將下列程式碼儲存在名為 Textwebparthelp.htm 檔案，並將它放在您的網站所裝載的.aspx 頁面與相同的目錄`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 程式碼範例也會包含下列部分類別，其中包含的程式碼中處理事件的.aspx 頁面。The code example also includes the following partial class that contains the code to handle the events in the .aspx page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#4)] 程式碼範例的其他部分是裝載的.aspx 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制，並示範如何使用屬性。The other part of the code example is the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control and demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，頁面頂端附近`<@ Register %>`宣告用來參考編譯`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，應該放在 bin 子資料夾。Notice that near the top of the page, an `<@ Register %>` declaration is used to reference the compiled `TextDisplayWebPart` control, which should be placed in a subfolder named Bin. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#1)] 也請注意，屬性用於以宣告方式``項目來設定動詞的文字，如下列程式碼範例所示。Also note that the property is used declaratively on the `` element to set the text for the verb, as shown in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 最後，請注意下列的程式碼範例，上設定屬性``項目提供的說明檔的 URL。Finally, note in the following code example that the property is set on the `` element to provide the URL to the Help file. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**目錄模式**中的功能表項目**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Catalog Mode** menu item in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into catalog display mode. 新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入頁面、 關閉目錄，然後返回頁面一般瀏覽模式。Add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, close the catalog, and return the page to normal browse mode. 如果您按一下動詞命令下拉式功能表中的標題列`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，您可以存取用來開啟 [說明] 頁面的說明動詞命令。If you click the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, you can access the help verb to open the Help page.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出區域中的控制項是垂直排列或是水平排列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether controls in a zone are arranged vertically or horizontally.

value.span: 值，決定區域中控制項的排列方式。

span.span: An value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.

value.span: 預設方向是 。

span.span: The default orientation is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是有關如何 Web 組件控制項的配置區域中。The property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone. 使用預設方向，以由上到下排列，呈現控制項根據每個控制項的值。With the default orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the value of each control. 與方向，控制項的排列並存，受限於區域的寬度。With a orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone. Internet Explorer 可能會影響的高度控制項，以及包含該區域的高度。Internet Explorer can affect the height of a control, and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 會呈現在相容性模式 （回溯相容於舊版瀏覽器），或在標準模式中的網頁 (取決於是否存在`DOCTYPE`頁面中的宣告)。Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 這些模式的相關資訊，請參閱 DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)屬性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 當 Internet Explorer 會呈現標準模式中的頁面時，在某些情況下它不會不調整大小資料格在資料表中，即使是儲存格的 HTML 標記``。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 如此一來，控制項和其包含的區域會轉譯，讓控制項執行自動縮放以內部網路區域的全部高度。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 在兩個情況下，就會發生這種類型的轉譯。This type of rendering occurs in two cases. - 當區域屬性設定為，而且您在區域上明確設定高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要啟用控制項填滿區域的全部高度，請勿指定水平區域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone. - 當區域屬性設定為，且未明確設定的區域 （或包含的控制項） 的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls). 若要啟用控制項填滿區域的全部高度，設定的區域或高度控制項的垂直區域中。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone. 本主題的程式碼範例示範如何正常使用屬性。The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the property. 程式碼範例，示範高度相關的轉譯問題，以及如何解決它，請參閱屬性。For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative and programmatic use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會影響`WebPartZone1`之後您網頁瀏覽器中載入。This value impacts `WebPartZone1`, after you load the page into a browser. Web 組件中的控制項區域會以水平方式轉譯。The Web Parts controls in the zone are rendered horizontally. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#2)] 您可以按一下**切換版面配置方向**按鈕來變更區域的方向。You can click the **Toggle Layout Orientation** button to change the orientation of the zone. 切換方向的程式碼就會發生在下列程式碼範例來自部分類別。The code to toggle the orientation occurs in the following code example from the partial class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，您可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法會覆寫基底方法載入狀態，進行動詞命令和在區域中的動詞命令功能表衍生自類別。The method overrides the base method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the class.

summary.span: 取得樣式屬性，這些屬性會套用至動詞命令功能表上已選取動詞命令文字旁邊的核取記號影像。

span.span: Gets style attributes that are applied to the check mark image that appears on a verbs menu next to the selected verb text.

value.span: ，包含動詞命令功能表中核取記號影像的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains the style attributes for check mark images in a verbs menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性適用於自訂時具有動詞命令功能表中的物件及其屬性值設定為`true`。The property applies only when there is a custom object in a verbs menu that has its property value set to `true`. 中包含的樣式屬性屬性相關的功能表中的動詞命令的文字旁邊出現的核取記號影像樣式。The style attributes contained in the property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu. 每個控制區域就會在其標題列中有它自己的動詞命令功能表。Each control in a zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar. 動詞命令功能表可以包含這兩個標準指令動詞，包含在 Web 組件控制項集合，而且自訂開發人員所建立的物件。The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom objects created by developers. 中的標準動詞控制動詞命令功能表-包括匯出、 刪除和開啟說明的動詞命令單向動作動詞命令，執行其工作一次並完成頁面。The standard verbs in a control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done. 沒有需要標記的核取記號，功能表中的這些動詞命令，因為無一表示任何繼續狀態。There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state. 因此，無法設定這些動詞命令上的屬性，而屬性不會完全不套用它們。Therefore, the property on these verbs cannot be set, and the property does not apply to them at all. 不過，開發人員可以建立自訂控制項可能會指出繼續狀態的核取記號，藉由設定其屬性`true`。However, developers can create a custom control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響的區域，不論標籤是否包含影像、 文字或兩者中的每個 Web 組件控制項的動詞命令功能表標籤的樣式。The property affects the style of the label on the verbs menu of each Web Parts control in a zone, regardless of whether the label contains an image, text, or both. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會影響`WebPartZone2`。This value impacts `WebPartZone2`. 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，將頁面切換至編輯模式，並請注意，動詞命令功能表的色彩標示在`WebPartZone2`是指派給它的宣告式標記中的色彩。After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode, and notice that the color for the verbs menu label in `WebPartZone2` is the color assigned to it in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您設定每個出現的下拉式清單動詞命令功能表的樣式屬性區域中的控制項。The property enables you to set style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on each control in a zone. 雖然物件本身是唯讀，您仍然可以設定基礎屬性的值。While the object itself is read-only, you can still set values for the underlying attributes. 您可以設定整個功能表，例如其框線色彩、 樣式和寬度，樣式屬性字型詳細資料。高度和寬度。背景色彩。資料格填補和間距。陰影色彩 （如果使用者的作業系統中啟用遮蔽）;和格線。You can set style attributes for the entire menu, such as its border color, style, and width; font details; height and width; background color; cell padding and spacing; shadow color (if shadowing is enabled in the user's operating system); and gridlines. 屬性時，才適用屬性值設定為，預設值。The property applies only when the property value is set to , which is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的樣式資訊屬性適用於個別的動詞命令在動詞命令功能表中，當使用者將滑鼠指標移到其中一個指令動詞。The style information contained in the property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs. 這個屬性是唯讀的雖然您可以設定的樣式屬性的基礎物件。Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. 因為使用 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的快顯的物件來建立包含動詞命令的功能表時，功能表不會正確呈現其框線時滑鼠指標放在不同的文字長度的動詞命令。Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths. 最佳解決這個問題是宣告``元素不可見的框線，因此所有動詞命令的功能表寬度是完全相同的大小。The best workaround for this is to declare a `` element with an invisible border, so the menu width for all verbs is exactly the same size. 宣告項目區域內，就會發生，可能看起來如下：The declarative element would occur within a zone, and would look as follows: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會影響`WebPartZone2`。This value impacts `WebPartZone2`. 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，將網頁切換至編輯模式。After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表，並請注意，在控制項上的動詞命令功能表的背景色彩`WebPartZone2`是指派給它的宣告式標記中的色彩。Click the verbs menu, and notice that the background color for the verbs menu on the control in `WebPartZone2` is the color assigned to it in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的最小化動詞屬性會出現在每個動詞命令功能表區域中的控制項。The minimize verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 動詞命令會出現在所有頁面顯示模式。The verb appears in all page display modes. 最小化控制項它摺疊較小的大小、 離開只標題列控制項的可見，並還原動詞命令顯示的標題列中。Minimizing a control collapses it down to a smaller size, leaves only the title bar of the control visible, and makes a restore verb visible in the title bar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼屬性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換是否要啟用或停用最小化動詞命令的程式碼。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the minimize verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項且包含使用者介面 (UI)。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定的值`Description`屬性的使用者將滑鼠指標透過動詞命令功能表中的動詞時，會顯示為工具提示文字。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制權傳輸至頁面上，如果未新增。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用最小化動詞`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the minimize verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 啟用指令動詞時，您也可以按一下控制項降到最低。When the verb is enabled, you can also click it to minimize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫中衍生方法區域類別，以新增其他物件加入您的區域中的標準動詞的集合。You can override the method in a derived zone class to add additional objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone. 您可以藉由新增至集合中的動詞命令屬性。You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的處理常式藉由覆寫事件方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至衍生區域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 程式碼範例包含兩個原始程式檔。The code example contains two source files. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 程式碼範例的第一個部分會是原始碼的簡單控制項衍生自類別。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是針對衍生的原始程式碼區域會覆寫方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至區域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 程式碼也會建立自訂動詞命令顯示的動詞命令功能表中控制項包含在此區域中，並動詞命令建立另一份目前控制項。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載在衍生的區域的網頁和控制項。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`指示詞參考衍生的區域元件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果瀏覽器，將頁面載入控制項會出現在區域中。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 按一下 [動作] 功能表，然後按一下**CopyWebPart**動詞命令，並建立一份控制項。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現的區域，這是主要內容區域的頁首和頁尾區域之間，且包含主體區域控制項。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法會覆寫中的基底方法類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特定的轉譯屬性 (attribute) 套用至唯一區域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply uniquely to zones. 方法會呈現資料表，其中包含主體的整個內容，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，依據各種條件，包括是否屬性設定為垂直或水平，及是否頁面目前為設計顯示模式。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including whether the property is set to vertical or horizontal, and whether the page is currently in design display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件動詞表示使用者可以在 Web 組件頁面上，最小化、 關閉或還原的控制項，例如使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的動作將控制項加入頁面。或取消動作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 動詞命令由在 UI 中可點按的物件，您可以設定為使用會顯示為超連結、 影像或按鈕屬性。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the property. 屬性適用於只存在於區域層級，而不是存在於每個的動詞命令的指令動詞區域中的控制項。The property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the controls in a zone. 例如，當您將頁面切換至目錄模式或編輯模式時，有區域層級動詞命令只會套用到整個區域層級的動作區域的頁尾中。For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone. 與較舊的 （「 舊版 」） 瀏覽器存取 Web 組件頁面時，會套用屬性。The property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser. 您必須指派值給每個特定的動詞命令，會導致出現在其區域動詞的映像的屬性。You must assign a value to the property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone. 如果您未提供影像的 URL，動詞命令的屬性預設為。If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's property defaults to . 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以包含參考，這些控制項的直接繼承自類別，以及其他 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項或自訂區域內的控制項。The property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone. 動態設定的 Web 組件控制項包裝不是任何控制項控制項作為控制在執行階段; 這個機制可讓您使用 ASP.NET 控制項的所有型別作為 Web 組件控制項。The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a control as a control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 下列程式碼範例存取屬性以程式設計的方式，並顯示清單中所包含的控制項`WebPartZone1`。The following code example accesses the property programmatically and displays a list of the controls contained in `WebPartZone1`. 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，按一下 [] 按鈕**清單 WebPartZone1 WebParts**。After you load the page into a browser, click the button labeled **List WebPartZone1 WebParts**. 顯示的識別碼和類型的控制項。The IDs and types of the controls are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否在動詞在標題列控制項，或在下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中的方式呈現區域中的控制項。The property determines whether verbs on controls in a zone are rendered in the title bar of the controls, or in a drop-down verbs menu. 若要在標題列中呈現動詞命令，您也可以設定和屬性變更的指令動詞的外觀。If the verbs are to be rendered in the title bar, you can also set the and properties to change the appearance of the verbs.
